headline: Bartlett must keep up pressure for proposed shipyards | Editorial
author: Editorial Board
sentences: Edward L. Bartlett Jr., president of Bartlett Maritime Corp., wants to bring U.S. Navy repair shipyards to Lorain and Lordstown, and he is correct to keep up the pressure to land the contract.
Bartlett hosted a news conference March 9 live on YouTube in Washington, D.C., in an effort to speed up the process to build the Naval shipyards in Northeast Ohio.
